          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Charging rechargeable batteries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufladende nachladbare Batterien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Batteries rechargeables de remplissage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Baterias recarregáveis carregando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Batterie rechargeable caricantesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φορτίζοντας επαναφορτιζόμενες μπαταρίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Baterías recargables de carga</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing that rechargeable batteries can store chemical energy from electricity by charging.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy store</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nickel cadmium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rechargeable batteries</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die zeigen, daß 
nachladbare Batterien chemische Energie von der Elektrizität 
speichern können, indem sie aufladen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations prouvant que les 
batteries rechargeables peuvent enregistrer l'énergie chimique de 
l'électricité par le remplissage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram 
que as baterias recarregáveis podem armazenar a energia química da 
eletricidade carregando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che indicano 
che le batterie rechargeable possono memorizzare l'energia chimica 
proveniente da elettricità caricandosi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που δείχνουν ότι οι 
επαναφορτιζόμενες μπαταρίες μπορούν να καταχωρήσουν τη χημική 
ενέργεια από την ηλεκτρική ενέργεια με τη φόρτιση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran que las 
baterías recargables pueden salvar energía química de la 
electricidad cargando.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
